name: Mahajan Industrial
description: manufacturer and supplier of Coil Spring
overview:
Under the able guidance of our owner Mr. V K Gupta, MAHAJAN INDUSTRIAL CORP. has achieved a benchmark position in the industry by manufacturing and supplying of Engine Valve Springs, Fuel Injector Springs, Suspension Springs, Wire Forms, Tension & Torsion Springs, Die Springs, Heavy Duty Springs, Coil Springs and many more.

Infrastructure: Our Infrastructural facility sprawls over a large area and is segregated into various departments like manufacturing, R & D, warehousing & packaging, quality control unit & others to enable smooth functioning of all the business operations. We organize a systematic storage plan of our products that helps in quick processing of the bulk orders of the customers, owing to our sophisticated warehouse.

Our Team: We have a dexterous team of experts that has a very rich experience in the industry domain and committed towards the attainment of complete customer satisfaction. We regularly organize training sessions and seminars to further upgrade the skills and knowledge of our professionals with ever changing market demands. We believe in providing true value for money and that reflects through our quality approved products.

Quality:
We are an ISO 9001:2008 Certified Company that is highly demanded and admired amongst the customers for the deliverance of impeccable quality products that are in conformation with industry standards. Our stringent quality policies are diligently followed by every member of the company to facilitate the production of quality driven production that are able to live up to the expectations of the customers.
